title: What changes have you noticed in society?

korean: 최근 몇 년 사이에 사회가 정말 많이 변한 것 같아요.
가장 크게 느끼는 건 디지털화가 엄청 빨리 진행됐다는 거예요.
이제는 거의 모든 게 스마트폰으로 가능하잖아요.
은행, 쇼핑, 예약, 결제 등 오프라인으로 할 필요가 거의 없어졌어요.
제 주변만 봐도 혼자 사는 친구들이 대부분이거든요.
또 일하는 방식도 많이 바뀐 것 같아요.
재택근무나 유연근무제가 코로나 이후로 많이 늘었죠.
분리수거나 일회용품 줄이기 같은 실천들이 일상화됐고요.
전반적으로 사회가 더 개인화되고 디지털화된 것 같아요.
english: I think society has really changed a lot in recent years.
What I feel most is that digitalization has progressed incredibly fast.
Now almost everything is possible with a smartphone.
Banking, shopping, reservations, payments - there's almost no need to do them offline.
And single-person households have really increased a lot.
Just looking around me, most of my friends live alone.
So many products and services for single people have also appeared.
Also, the way of working seems to have changed a lot.
Remote work and flexible work systems increased a lot after COVID.
Interest in environmental issues has also increased.
Practices like separating recycling and reducing disposable products have become routine.
Overall, I think society has become more individualized and digitalized.
